comments.text:
Screenshot: http://grab.by/8eA2

It would be nice if the displayed URL contained the *first* segment after the last / in that screenshot, e.g. for the above it would be:
https://github.com/.../93918595975618edf...

I can imagine this being more useful in general, as often navigation differs at the last "folder".

I may be wrong, of course, hence it's just a suggestion :)

comments.text:
Starting with Firefox 4b12 the link display moved from the location bar to the bottom which is a very good move IMHO.
But anyway the link is still truncated even if the browser window has enough space to display it. So this report still applies partly but I would suggest to use the full available width before truncation at all.
